localised_text.tooltip_text: There are no saved characters to load for this faction

icon_agent.componentleveltooltip: Current / maximum number of active agents||Conquer additional territory to increase your imperium, thereby increasing the number of agents you can maintain.

component_text.text: Each additional non-Legendary Lord increases your total army upkeep by 5%.
Your current total army upkeep is estimated to increase by:
A new character will be available on the next turn.
